评论详情: I have this in two colors and love both. The pants do run large/long. Material is so soft. Great value for the money. Perfect for travel.

评论概述: Order 2 sizes smaller.  It runs way big!!
评论详情: Runs VERY big!!! I ordered a small and the pants wrapped around me twice.  Entirely false sizing.

评论概述: Great Quality, Top is Very Short
评论详情: This set is very quality and feels like spanxs to me. For reference I am 5'6" & 215lbs.I ordered the XL. I still haven't decided if I will be keeping this set not due to quality but the top is very short for me almost a crop length and I am very long torso. The pants are so flattering with a wide leg and are the perfect length for me. The top is so cute and flattering but I can't lift my arms with out my stomach showing due to the length I wish it was just a bit longer.

评论概述: Super cute but not quite long enough
评论详情: This set is super cute and great quality! Unfortunately, the pants are too short. I am 5’8”, 130-135 lbs. and they hit jus above my ankle. (Not flattering at all). Because i couldn’t find another set that was any longer, I let the hem out and added a double layer of additional fabrics with frayed edging to lengthen them and they turned out super cute! I wish they made pants for tall girls!!!  If you are over 5’6” these will likely be too short for you. The fabric drapes nicely and is not light or thin. The top is semi cropped, if I raise my arms my stomach shows, but it sits nicely at the waist with enough “blouse” to keep me covered and look stylish. I wear a tight tank underneath because I don’t like showing my midsection. But the tank doesn’t show unless I am reaching up. Great winter set! I’ll be wearing them on a ski trip and for winter travel. I would give 5 starts if they were longer :)

Very comfy, soft, and warm without being too thick or bulky. I’m 5’5” and normal wear a medium, but I ordered a small and it fits perfectly. The only weird thing was that it arrived in the clear zippered bag (i.e. unsecured) and there were no tags attached. Definitely will be washing before wearing!
Love this dupe! Super comfy and love even more that it has pockets!!
True to size. Love the quality.

I get so many compliments on this set. Sometimes I wear it together, and sometimes I split it up, but regardless of how I'm wearing it, people always comment. It's comfy, and I'd say size down if you're between sizes
This set reminds of a set I have that was much more expensive.  It’s super soft and fits great!
The fabric is thick and feels nice. This has held up through several wishes and fits great. It’s cute and breast-feeding friendly; I would definitely buy this again!

评论概述: So soft and such great quality!
评论详情: Where do I even start?  I love this set soooo much! It’s thick and soft and feels designer.  It looks like an expensive set for a fraction of the cost. The fit is true to size.  So warm and cozy.  If your a short girly these run really long so you’ll probably need to hem unless you intend on wearing tall heals or platforms

评论概述: Comfy, Buttery Soft, & SUPER CUTE TOO!
评论详情: This set is AMAZING. It is so soft. Looks almost identical to the high end s P anKs alternative. :) Only complaint is I am pretty tall, 5'9, and I wish there was a long version. Although these do not 'high water' per se. They could be a bit longer. If you are 5'7 or shorter they will be long on you friend. :) LUCKY!  I bought the size MEDIUM
This is the truest red and I have received so many compliments!! Love love love !!

评论概述: Don’t expect Spanx fabric, but the fit is nice
评论详情: I bought this because of a review saying it was like the Spanx sweats - they are NOT THE SAME. Spanx are buttery soft and these are your standard polyester feeling sweats. They are cute on and the cut is nice, but they are definitely not the same. For someone who is extremely sensitive to fabric - I can say these are not soft.
The pants are so long and you would have to significantly alter them to be able to wear them. The pink is basically see through. It was soft but I had to return them because it was unwearable.
I like it and it fits me in medium

评论概述: The pants are actually long enough
评论详情: True to size, and I finally found long enough sweatpants!

I recently purchased the Spanx version of this exact set for over $200. I had to order this set to compare and I absolutely love it… extra bonus with the pockets. I am definitely ordering another set and sharing my find with my girlfriends.

Very soft, maybe not “buttery” as some of the videos state, but it is soft and very comfortable. I ordered the red and it is RED.  5’6” 135 lbs and the medium is  perfect on me.  The only thing that would make it more perfect is if it wasn’t a little bit wrinkled from the packaging.  But a quick little steam and good to go.  I may be ordering in another color as well.And the best part is that it came same day as I ordered it.  Can’t beat that.
I love to put this outfit on. It is a simple outfit that looks nice and does not call attention to itself.
I really like the feel and weight of the material.  It also fits nice.
Great quality, color is on point and the fit is true to size. Love the soft feel and structure. I’ll definitely be purchasing additional colors.

This was a nice set - not overwhelmingly great, but cute.  Soft material, not thick, falls nicely.  However both pieces are cut pretty large. Pants are really big and the only way I could wear would be to roll up the hem.  Top is cut large but wearable.  I would say I don’t think the set justifies the price.
the fabric on this feels like butter but I do think it runs a little big
Super comfy, feels luxurious with half the price! Trying to save money. Great find.
Seems to run large. Am returning
This is a really well made, perfect fitting, stylish, true to size, quality track suit.  On line clothing can be hit or miss but this one is a winner.  Planning to buy a few more colors right now.
Absolutely the best spanx dupe. So soft. So comfy. I have bought it in 5 different colors. Soooo worth the money!!!!!! Perfect for airport travel, postpartum, or showing houses.

评论概述: Not oversized, so check size chart before you buy
评论详情: This set is very comfortable and not too heavy but not too light either. The fabric and quality feels very high end. However, it is not oversized as advertised. I am 5’9” 160 pounds and I needed the XL. The top is almost cropped length and the pants do not touch the ground on me.
I'm 5'9 and it comes to my ankles
I like the fit of this set.  I am 5'3" 115lbs.  The pants are higher waist and the top is shorter.  Usually I like a longer top but this works well with these pants.  Midriff is never exposed.
The material of this matching set is high-quality, so soft, and feels great!

Surprised at the excellent quality and reasonable price of this set. Feels and looks much more expensive, so soft and cozy ( like a scuba material) washes really well. No pilling!  I’m 5’8” 160lbs and purchased the large. It is a bit loose, but, I needed the large for the length. I’m all legs.  Definitely recommend!

This is a great set for the price.  Fabric seems good. They run slightly big. Pants are too short for my taste - I always have problems finding them long enough (33 inseam). I spent 5x as much money and bought the Spanx air essentials to get long pants.  This set is similar but more lightweight - I like it better!!  Just wish they were longer.  5’9” 130 lbs. Bought a small.
Pants too big even when sizing down and top is wayyyyy too short
Lulu dupe. Buttery soft and super comfortable. I would suggest sizing down.

评论概述: Love This! But the pants are long
评论详情: Such a cute outfit! Very comfortable for travel. Super breathable.  The only problem is the pants are pretty long. I ordered a small and even with the pants rolled up once around my waist, they’re still a bit too long. Still love this though and would buy again!

评论概述: Too large zipper not black not impressed

Very good Quality!
Breathable, stretchy material. Elevated casual wear that can be worn anywhere!

I wasn’t expecting this, but AMZN came through!  This set is so comfy, material weight / quality is good, doesn’t itch and I can wear to work dressed up or down , and great travel set. Will order more colors. Runs big, I normally wear a med, ordered a small and still roomy more relaxed fit but holds shape.
Really great quality, Soft material. Bought b/c of the TALL reviews. I'm 5'9 and they're too short. Inseam is 30 inches.
Feel great
I am wearing it today when it is 0 degrees fahrenheit outside. It is very soft, comfortable and elegant. It fits me perfectly.
I like this set! I got the xs based off reviews. I’m 5’5. Hope it doesn’t shrink so I wonder how the small would fit. Wish it came in a taupe color. Very comfy.
I got the black and the gray colors. The black was so soft and luxurious and the gray is scratchy and not as nice!
SO COMFORTABLE but you still look put together. Length is perfect- I’m 5’6 for reference. 10/10
This set is so comfortable and looks expensive. I am 5.7 and the fit was perfect. I will definitely purchase more in other colors.
Runs a little oversized. So comfortable. I’ve ordered 2 more
Got the darker storm color. Can't see the cellulite as well. I love this one.
Super soft . I’m am 5”4 the pants were long on me
The top had a very noticeable stain immediately upon opening packaging.
It was wrinkled, balled up with hair and used.. it was gross
Purchased the set for myself and I love it. It fits well and the fabric feels smooth and buttery. I am 5'5" and 150 lbs.; I ordered an XL. I was not looking for a tight fit; it's perfect.

So large I’m 5”3 105 lbs… and I couldn’t even do the smallest size…. Took forever to arrive was super excited based on all the reviews but of course everything is always to big on me…. Catering to the larger ppl… lame
I have washed these pajamas in hot water several times. They are still bleeding all over my sheets. Who knows what they did to my skin. They are now in the trash!

Love this 2piece set. Fabric is beautiful, so soft. Here is the only thing, like many XS sizes it is slightly big on me. I’m 5’2, 90lbs. To me that is an honest extra small. The pants are slightly big (have to roll the waistband over) and a bit long. Regardless I’m keeping it and love it.

The color is the perfect red for the holidays. I've never seen the Spanx set to know the difference in fabric. I'm 5'7", 138 pounds. The small was too big. I'm busty and slender through the hips. The extra small fits perfectly. (I am NOT an extra small in tops usually) The length is long even for me. I plan on wearing this outfit with n thick soled Uggs so it works.
Cute and comfy. Definitely runs big I ordered a XL which they said is a size US 10 but it fits well and I’m using more like a size 14.
Better than the spanx suit- I have both!
Love this. Soft and cozy. Wash well

Material was good and color was vibrant, but I have more of a slight straight body type (some hips with larger thighs) with not much of a butt so this was not very flattering for my shape.  Also, at 5'1 the pants were way too long. If you are taller in stature and more curvy, this might be a winner , but just not for me.

评论概述: Great pants for tall girls, great shirt for shorties
评论详情: Love the outfit, collar is a little out of control, but doable.  Pants would be too long for anyone under 5’8”. I’m 5’10” and they were pretty perfect in length and super comfy.  The shirt  is way too short for me. I have a longer torso, but it was a definite crop top- not what I was looking for.
I love this but will be buying it in another color but in xsmall
Very satisfied with quality of fabric. Fits true to size. Feels wonderful. Very comfy.
Nice out. Fit to wear around the house or out and about doing chores Very soft Material is very nice

This stylish, comfortable set is great for anytime, but especially for traveling. It’s not too thick or heavy so that you get over heated. The material is soft, stretchy, and has generous pockets. Highly recommend.
Love the quality!

I have a hard time with tops that aren’t full length and this gives a really cute modern style while being one of the most comfortable things I’ve worn in a while. Love this and will be ordering more colors
Very good quality, extra soft material. You won’t regret

评论概述: fit is off. material too thin.
评论详情: Such a let down.  I ordered this set in gray and apricot.  the apricot is a completely different material than the gray.  The apricot is too thin, see-through, the pockets completely show through the pant and they show every blemish in your behind if you have any.  I am 5'8, 133#.  the pants are high waisted and the waist band is too tight- very uncomfortable.  There is weird gathering at the waist band which makes the belly part of the pant ballon out. The pants were just long enough but I fear they will shrink when washed.  I will never know though because I am returning due to thin material and off fitting.The gray is a thicker material but still has the weird poofy gathering at the waist and the tight high waist band which is very uncomfortable.The top also has this cheap stark white lining that shows unless you zip it all the way up.  the white contrast of the lining against the dark gray is quite ugly imo.  Arms were also too short for me when i reached my arms out.

评论概述: Softest material and vibrant red color
评论详情: Loved this set!!! I exchanged for an XS as the S pants were too loose on me. Super nice quality material.

So I bought this two piece to wear to travel and it was the best thing I could’ve done. It’s super comfy and cozy. And super tall girl friendly.  I’m abt 5’7 and it was longer than I expected! Definitely great to run errands or a nice lil chill fit.

The material of this set feels so much more expensive than it is! The brown color is beautiful. The pants are definitely meant to be worn high waisted. I’m currently 40 weeks pregnant, I’ve been rolling them under my bump and I get compliments every time I wear the pants. I haven’t been able to wear the jacket with the bump yet but I tried it on and can’t wait to wear it postpartum. They are incredibly soft, great weight to the fabric and wash well.

This set is so cute and the quality is great. I wanted the brand name set that looks a lot like this but didn’t want to pay the $$$. The red is vibrant. I found the top true to size and the pants were slightly loose in the waist but that just makes them comfy. I would stay true to size. The fabric has a nice weight to it.
Great fit
Great quality - very comfy
Very soft, love the wide leg, beautiful color, runs a little big. Its.l  beautiful two piece.
Great material,super comfortable

评论概述: Really super soft but size off a tad
评论详情: I really do like this sweat set. It's super soft, great quality. I'm 5'3" and 137 and I bought a medium. The pants i rolled twice on my waist and were still a tad long. Hope that helps someone else! :)

This is such an amazing set, so soft, so comfy. I did order a medium even though my usual size is a large (generally a size 12 and I’m 5’7”). It was a little tight in the waist so I cut the elastic in the front which solved the issue. The length and fit was perfect everywhere else. Can’t wait to wear it on a trip soon!
Love this so much. So soft and comfy. Quick delivery also!

评论概述: Extremely comfy and fits to size.
评论详情: I bought a medium to travel and I was extremely comfortable and pleased with this set. Will definitely buy again.

I wasn’t sure on sizing for this set at first. I’m usually a medium, but read the reviews and decided to size down to a small. It fits perfectly!!! The pants don’t squeeze my stomach and the whole set is silky smooth! I got the brown set. Brown color is a bit more on the warmer side, so I wouldn’t consider it a dark brown though.
I bought medium. I’m 125 and 5’7” , I like a little loose fit. Soft and color is beautiful red. 100% recommend.
Feels so silky soft, cozy, comfy. Fits great
I wanted to love this, but it's made too big.  I'm 5'3, 125 and I got the XS, too big.
Fits great, love the fabric and great price! (bought by the wife of “Just a Guy”)

Bought this as it was compared to Spanx for half the price!  Material is amazing.  I am 5'7" and 150 and I bought a medium.  The length is perfect on me and it fits great.  I only received this the other day and we live in Florida so I haven't had a chance to wear it but it will be perfect for travel or a put together casual outing (when it cools off😉)

These sets are so comfy!! Wear them as a casual outfit or dress them up. Fantastic material that is super comfortable. They wash up great and don't shrink when dried. Easily layered for cooler temps.  You can wear as a set or separate pieces and great for traveling. I feel this is a very reasonable price for the quality. I ordered the green, navy, and black and love all of the colors. The small fit me perfect. The waist band sits on your waist, but doesn't cut in.
I ordered a petite XS This could fit a giant . Very disappointed. As I Was packing this outfit on a trip leaving tomorrow and can’t bring it .
Amazing. I’m 5’4” pants are long but soooo comfy. This is the most amazing outfit I’ve ever had
Size is TTS. The top is more of a crop top. Comfortable ✅ The sale price was definitely worth it! The color I ordered was black and hasn’t faded.
Comfy, cozy set to wear in the house or out and about!

I love these but…I bought 7 of these 2 of them were gray others different colors. It says in the description thick fabric. I have a 4 star only because the other colors are not the thick and warmer fabric as the grays. Still love them but if you are looking for the thicker fabric and warmer suit get gray.
Close dupe for the Spanx set for a fraction of the price. I got it in the red and it's a beautiful bright, clear red. Runs a little large but it's meant to be oversized.

10/10 recommend. The material is nice and thick for cooler days. Fit is flattering. Super comfy and a great dupe for a much more expensive brand. Material is great, doesn’t snag and washes well. Need this in every color.
This is amazing. The fabric is soft beautiful colors. It does run large. I had to size down. The length is perfect for my height. I am 5' 8"

If you're looking for sweat pants material this isn't it, it's very nice more of a fall wear the feel is buttery soft. I'm 148 pounds 32 DDD in chest bought xs reading reviews I'm usually a medium or small in regular sweat pants, there made large but cute. The material isn't cheap thin more like a dry nike material kinda hard to explain but love it.
